name: Strata (itch) (sicklydove)
description:
Hello! Thanks for stopping by.

Strata is a short (~5-minute) interactive experience reflecting on the ongoing climate crisis. It was an experiment into trying something new for AMAZE 2021. I hope you enjoy it.

Credits:
Design, Programming, Art
Laurie James @sicklydove
Music:
Greg Taylor

All proceeds will be donated towards gold-standard carbon offsetting projects.
